name: Frogs (Lewis)
description:
Created for Mini Jam 79: Theme - Frogs

Flip rocks and collect frogs in this calm casual exploration game.

Maybe you'll even find a snail :o

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Pick up

Asset credits:

https://www.zapsplat.com/music/frogs-toads-close/
